::Lavatron::

Seeing Tantrum charge again, Lavatron launches another kick at the
bot. He was surprised that Tantrum was still concious after the first
kick.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Tantrum gets the full brunt of the kick in his head, and is sent
into the
> air with the momentum of the huge robots kick. Like a large
football, he
> spirals toward the ground, leaving a large crater. He pulls himself
out,
> one of his horns was cracked, but he didnt care, he was kicked in
the head,
> the strongest place in his body, and now he was M...A....D. He spat
oil on
> the ground, rubbed his hoof against it, and set out in another
charge
> towards Lavatron.
